description:
You are a down and out big time boss in the small time since your company was forced into bankruptcy by an underhand competitor that stooped lower than even you would dare.

Of course revenge is a dish best served over a drink at the high class gentlemanâ€™s club. This is where the game will take place to rebuild your fortune and show your competitor who really is boss.

This is a witty card game with a few simple rules to test your intelligence.
name: The Seller
